description: Pass this schematic to the "run" command to set up server-side rendering for an app.
title: Angular Universal App Options Schema

___testTsconfigFileName.description: The name of the TypeScript configuration file for tests.

___main.description: The name of the main entry-point file.

___appDir.description: The name of the application folder.

___rootModuleFileName.description: The name of the root NgModule file.

___tsconfigFileName.description: The name of the TypeScript configuration file.

___clientProject.description: The name of the related client app. Required in place of "project".

___skipInstall.description: When true, does not install packages for dependencies.

___appId.description: The app identifier to use for transition.

___test.description: The name of the test entry-point file.

___rootModuleClassName.description: The name of the root NgModule class.
